text: læa cea ca hen dwng xathity meux man khun man ca khlxy cak tha khxng phwk khea pi thang khwa læa meux man tk man ca ben xxk pi thang say doy phwk khea xyu nı thi long kwang khxng man nan khux swn hnung cak sayyan thanghlay khx ngxallxhˌ phu dı thi xallxhˌ thrng næa thang thi thuk txng kæ khea khea k khux phu thi xyu nı næwthang thi thuk txng læa phu dı thi phraxngkh thrng hı khea hlng khea ca mi phb
